title: History’s Top Sect Leader - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manhua   Cultivation   Male Protagonist   Sect Development   Transmigration
author: 冥域天使
description:
Ye Wen had transmigrated into the body of a sect leader.

It wasn't bad, although the sect was a little weak and had so few disciples…

“Senior brother, Master said, 'The revitalization of the sect is now in your hands!'” his only junior sister said with a face brimming with dissatisfaction. “If you can't do that, then hurry up and just pass the sect leader's position to me!”>
